name: OhAvalancheBankerJoeStrategy
description: Oh! Finance Banker Joe Strategy. https://docs.traderjoexyz.com/. Standard, unleveraged strategy. Invest underlying tokens into derivative JTokens.

eventDecorators.name: Liquidate
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: Sweep
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

functionDecorators.name: bank
functionDecorators.description: The Bank that the Strategy is associated with.

functionDecorators.name: derivative
functionDecorators.description: The derivative token received from AaveV2 (aToken).

functionDecorators.name: derivativeBalance
functionDecorators.description: Balance of derivative tokens received from Strategy, if applicable.

functionDecorators.name: initializeBankerJoeStrategy
functionDecorators.description: Initializes the BankerJoe Strategy Proxy. The function should be called at time of deployment.

parameterDecorators.name: bank_
parameterDecorators.description: the bank associated with the strategy.

parameterDecorators.name: underlying_
parameterDecorators.description: the underlying token that is deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: derivative_
parameterDecorators.description: the JToken address received from BankerJoe.

parameterDecorators.name: reward_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the reward token JOE.

functionDecorators.name: investedBalance
functionDecorators.description: Get the balance of underlying invested by the Strategy. Get the exchange rate (which is scaled up by 1e18) and multiply by amount of JTokens.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of underlying the strategy has invested.

functionDecorators.name: reward
functionDecorators.description: The reward token received from AaveV2 (stkAave).

functionDecorators.name: rewardBalance
functionDecorators.description: Balance of reward tokens awaiting liquidation, if applicable.

functionDecorators.name: setRegistry
functionDecorators.description: Set the Registry for the contract. Only callable by Governance. Requires sender to be Governance of the new Registry to avoid bricking.Ideally should not be used.

functionDecorators.name: sweep
functionDecorators.description: Governance function to sweep any stuck / airdrop tokens to a given recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to sweep.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to sweep.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address to send the sweeped tokens to.

functionDecorators.name: underlying
functionDecorators.description: The underlying token the Strategy invests in AaveV2.

functionDecorators.name: underlyingBalance
functionDecorators.description: Balance of underlying awaiting Strategy investment.
